meanings.definition: Of or relating to the eye
meanings.sent1: The ophthalmic examination focused on the health of my eyes.
meanings.sent2: The ophthalmic nerve carries signals from the eye to the brain.
meanings.sent3: The ophthalmic glasses made me look like a scientist!
meanings.sent4: Her ophthalmic insight into the problem helped us find a solution.
meanings.sent5: The ophthalmic view of the sunset was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A medication or treatment for eye conditions
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed an ophthalmic ointment for my eye infection.
meanings.sent2: She applied the ophthalmic drops to reduce her eye redness.
meanings.sent3: Using the ophthalmic solution felt like a refreshing spa treatment for my eyes.
meanings.sent4: The ophthalmic medication worked like magic to clear up the irritation.
meanings.sent5: The ophthalmic treatment brought quick relief to his eye discomfort.

meanings.definition: A doctor specializing in eye care
meanings.sent1: The ophthalmic performed a thorough eye examination.
meanings.sent2: I have an appointment with the ophthalmic next week for my eye check-up.
meanings.sent3: The ophthalmic made me feel at ease during the eye test.
meanings.sent4: The ophthalmic's expertise in eye care is highly respected.
meanings.sent5: The ophthalmic recommended new glasses to improve my vision.
